# {{lb|zh|archaic}} [[w:Yongzhou|Lingling Commandery]] (present day Lingling district of [[w:Yongzhou|Yongzhou]], [[Hunan]])

===Usage notes===
In chapter 15 of the Mao Zonggang edition of [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]], it states that [[w:Zhang Ying (Han Dynasty)|Zhang Ying]] was made to defend [[w:Yongzhou|Lingling]], after having suffered a defeat. However, modern scholars believe this to be a misprint of Moling ([[秣陵]]), located in present day [[w:Jiangning District|Jiangning District]] of [[Nanjing]].
